library(tidyverse)
library(sf)

cameras <- read_csv("SL_camera_sites_2018_2021.csv") %>% 
  select(-c("northing","easting")) %>% 
  drop_na(latitude)

cameras <- st_as_sf(cameras, coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326)
st_write(cameras, "camera_locations.shp")
